mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (id, password, name, email, hp, address) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{hp}, #{address})
mapper.select: SELECT id, password, name, email, hp, address FROM members WHERE id = #{id}
